item.description:
About

Bello! I have been the author ofÂ MyNeotopia, for some time now, and I wanted to make a blog where I could share stuff that matters to me, in a more personal level... I think it's important for my readers and myself to not to mix my hobbies and my life goal.

item.title: Desktop Computer Build - PART 1
item.description:
Desktop Computer Build - PART 1

For some weeks now, I have been planning to build a Computer. I had to think about a lot about the configuration and the design. It ended up that I will take my time for building it because I won't have much time to use it anyway until the end of my studies.
